original_text: Festus replied that Paul was being kept at Caesarea and that he himself intended to go there shortly.
korean_text: 베스도가 대답하여 바울이 가이사랴에 구류된 것과 자기도 멀지 않아 떠나갈 것을 말하고

sentences.original_text: that Paul was being kept at Caesarea
and that he himself intended to go there shortly
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자기는 곧 그곳으로 가려고 한다고
